name: FPS - PVP Shooter Game
description:
Download and play PvP with friends and people all around the world! Invite friends and play together! And become a real strike force together! Boom! First person shooter games have never been so dynamic and exploding! Let the pixel wars begin!

- Team Deathmatch: PVP Teams battle against each other

- Try many classic weapons

- Strike! How many enemies can you shoot in a single round?

- Improve your fighter to have the best shooting experience!

- Upgrade your 3D guns to improve your fire strength! 

This is unstoppable gun games action! Simple and intuitive first person shooter game settings: auto-fire Huge arsenal of different weapons and pixel guns! 

This is online multiplayer shooter game for everybody! 

Play with friends or against them. Join exciting PvP right now!
